com.crio.qeats.services

Interface RestaurantService


  • public interface RestaurantService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.crio.qeats.exchanges.GetRestaurantsResponse findAllRestaurantsCloseBy(com.crio.qeats.exchanges.GetRestaurantsRequest getRestaurantsRequest, java.time.LocalTime currentTime)
      Get all the restaurants that are open now within a specific service radius.
      com.crio.qeats.exchanges.GetRestaurantsResponse findRestaurantsBySearchQuery(com.crio.qeats.exchanges.GetRestaurantsRequest getRestaurantsRequest, java.time.LocalTime currentTime)
      Get the restaurants by processing the query.
      com.crio.qeats.exchanges.GetRestaurantsResponse findRestaurantsBySearchQuery2(com.crio.qeats.exchanges.GetRestaurantsRequest getRestaurantsRequest, java.time.LocalTime currentTime) 
      com.crio.qeats.exchanges.GetRestaurantsResponse findRestaurantsBySearchQueryMt(com.crio.qeats.exchanges.GetRestaurantsRequest getRestaurantsRequest, java.time.LocalTime currentTime)
      Identical input and output to @link{findRestaurantsBySearchQuery} but use a multi-threaded implementation.

    • Method Detail

      • findAllRestaurantsCloseBy

        com.crio.qeats.exchanges.GetRestaurantsResponse findAllRestaurantsCloseBy(com.crio.qeats.exchanges.GetRestaurantsRequest getRestaurantsRequest,
                                                                          java.time.LocalTime currentTime)
        Get all the restaurants that are open now within a specific service radius. - For peak hours: 8AM - 10AM, 1PM-2PM, 7PM-9PM - service radius is 3KMs. - All other times, serving radius is 5KMs. - If there are no restaurants, return empty list of restaurants.
        Parameters:
        getRestaurantsRequest - valid lat/long
        currentTime - current time.
        Returns:
        GetRestaurantsRe-sponse object containing a list of open restaurants or an empty list if none fits the criteria.

      • findRestaurantsBySearchQuery

        com.crio.qeats.exchanges.GetRestaurantsResponse findRestaurantsBySearchQuery(com.crio.qeats.exchanges.GetRestaurantsRequest getRestaurantsRequest,
                                                                             java.time.LocalTime currentTime)
        Get the restaurants by processing the query. -Ordering rules 1) Restaurant name - exact matches first - partial matches second 2) Restaurant attributes - partial and full matches in any order 3) Item name - exact matches first - partial matches second 4) Item attributes - partial and full matches in any order - For peak hours: 8AM - 10AM, 1PM-2PM, 7PM-9PM - service radius is 3KMs. - All other times, serving radius is 5KMs. - If there are no restaurants, return empty list of restaurants.
        Parameters:
        getRestaurantsRequest - valid lat/long and searchFor
        Returns:
        GetRestaurantsResponse object containing a list of open restaurants or an empty list if none fits the criteria.

      • findRestaurantsBySearchQuery2

        com.crio.qeats.exchanges.GetRestaurantsResponse findRestaurantsBySearchQuery2(com.crio.qeats.exchanges.GetRestaurantsRequest getRestaurantsRequest,
                                                                              java.time.LocalTime currentTime)

      • findRestaurantsBySearchQueryMt

        com.crio.qeats.exchanges.GetRestaurantsResponse findRestaurantsBySearchQueryMt(com.crio.qeats.exchanges.GetRestaurantsRequest getRestaurantsRequest,
                                                                               java.time.LocalTime currentTime)
                                                                        throws java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException,
                                                                               java.lang.InterruptedException
        Identical input and output to @link{findRestaurantsBySearchQuery} but use a multi-threaded implementation.
        Parameters:
        getRestaurantsRequest - valid lat/long with searchFor string
        currentTime - current time
        Returns:
        GetRestaurantsResponse object containing a list of open restaurants or an empty list if none fits the criteria.
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
